price: (75) It will not be allowed to subside for them, and they, therein, are in despair.
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
